English Translation: You have the right to work, not to the fruits.
Just as the boy becomes a man, the soul passes on.
He who thinks the soul can kill or be killed is ignorant.
One not disturbed by desires is peaceful.
Whatever a great man does, others follow.
Nothing is as pure as true knowledge.
One who offers all actions to God is not tainted.
One must uplift oneself by oneself.
Wherever the mind wanders, bring it back.
The yogi sees the Self in all beings.
What one remembers at death determines rebirth.
Those devoted to Me are protected.
I am time, destroyer of worlds.
